content.p: This is an overview of the breadth and depth of expert resources that are available across Pain Centre Versus Arthritis. The resources include datasets, laboratory and clinical assessment tools, and much more. Details are provided of how you may access these resources for collaborative research. Biological Mass Spectrometry Multi-Electrode Array (MAE) Recordings Preclinical models of Osteoarthritis pain: from Bench to Clinic and back again Axon Transcriptomics Cohorts and Biorepositories Cognitive Testing in Pain Research In Vivo Microscopy Central Aspects of Pain (CAP) Questionnaire Quantitative Sensory Testing (QST) Clinical Sciences Building City Hospital Nottingham, NG5 1PB telephone: +44 (0) 115 823 1766 ext 31766 fax: +44 (0) 115 823 1757 email: paincentre@nottingham.ac.uk
